comments.text:
Steps to reproduce:

1)  Have two consecutive folders - one with all read mail, and the one after with some unread mail.
2)  Go to Go > Next > Unread Message
3)  See that dialog that comes up? ("Advance to next unread message in blah?") that's a modal.  We think we want it as a DoorHanger.

With us switching to tabs on top (see bug 644169), it makes more sense for us to have per-tab dialogs instead of blocking modals for things like this.  We'd like to switch to something like a DoorHanger here.
